bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there are yellow object and black object together, don't pack a black object into the box
goals.3: If there is a white and soft object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: you should never pick and place a box
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
